name: The Game Master Network
description:
From Rebecca Zamolo and Matt Slays comes Gamemaster Chase! A spectacular new adventure where Rebecca dashes and jumps through a tunnel to retrieve top secret collectables. Fans of Game Master Network play as Rebecca to collect gems, puzzle pieces and lie detector mixture that unlocks secret videos and messages that are ONLY available in the game.

Pick up invincible and magnet boosts to power up Rebecca as she faces Mr. X's Red Hood Spies, pits and spikes! The app also notifies you about the latest Game Master Network videos the moment they are released. Keep track of your longest runs and how many collectables you grab, then compare them to your friends and other fans through Game Center.

Features:
– Two types of Boosts: Invincibility and Magnetize!
– Unlimited scrolling levels that get harder as you go!
– Compete against friends and fans for longest run!
– Unlock collectables for special content only available here!
– Get notified about new YouTube videos first!
